price: (47) And give good tidings to the believers that they will have from Allāh great bounty.
arabic: وَبَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَضۡلٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wabashiri al-mu'minīna bi-anna lahum mina al-lahi faḍlan kabīran
